Edit a comment

Note: The reactions API is available for developers to preview. The url can be used to construct the API location for listing and creating reactions. See the blog post for full details. To receive the reactions object in the response for this endpoint you must provide a custom media type in the Accept header:

application/vnd.github.squirrel-girl-preview

Warning: The API may change without advance notice during the preview period. Preview features are not supported for production use. If you experience any issues, contact GitHub Support.

Edits the body text of a discussion comment. OAuth access tokens require the write:discussion scope.

PATCH /teams/:team_id/discussions/:discussion_number/comments/:comment_number

Parameters

Name Type Description
body string Required. The discussion comment's body text.

Example

{
  "body": "Do you like pineapples?"
}

Response

Status: 200 OK
